MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Grassfield Way. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations to locate an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:02PM on 12th January 2021.
